description:
Our local Sheriff in Sonoma County, Essick, is one of those. He tried to reach out to the “Public Health Officer” (who used to work for the Gates-funded CDC & WHO) multiple times asking why the lockdown orders are still in place for our county when we have a total of 4 “covid” deaths (the testing is so flawed that those 4 might be false positives). •

He was ignored and never replied to, so he declared that he will not be booking anyone into the jail for offenses related to opening up local businesses- as he should. •

Sheriffs like these need to be supported. If you are one of the scared asleeple people not supporting them, and afraid of a “virus” less deadly than seasonal flu, then you yourself stay home, mask up & wash your hands all day. •

Any time we drive our cars, we take a risk of dying. Should we ban driving, and “shelter in place” at home until no one dies from car accidents anymore? 🤔 •

It’s time for the American people to stand tall and just say no to lockdown, social distancing, vaccines, and all the rest of the pandemic theater. •

Dr. Pam Popper is a naturopath, an internationally recognized expert on nutrition, medicine & health, & the Executive Director of Wellness Forum Health. •

She’s a straight-talker who isn’t afraid to criticize national health organizations, government agencies, medical professionals, pharmaceutical companies, agricultural organizations & manufacturing companies, many of whom have agendas & priorities that interfere with distributing truthful information & promoting public health. •

Dr. Popper served as part of Dr. T. Colin Campbell’s teaching team at eCornell, teaching part of a certification course on plant-based nutrition. 🌱 •

She’s been featured in many documentaries, including “Processed People”, “Making a Killing”, & “Forks Over Knives”. Her most recent book is “Food Over Medicine: The Conversation That Can Save Your Life.” •

Subscribe to Dr. Pam’s weekly newsletter and video clips here:

https://wellnessforumhealth.com/news/ • •
•
